name: Grocery Run!
description:
In Grocery Run, you play a Andy, a college student who simply want to get her groceries but is also eager to avoid people as much as possible in fear of the Covid-19. Can you help him stay away from others but also get all his groceries!

Created by William Curran, Shravan Kumaran, Sanjay Kumaran, Akash Rao

NOTE: You will need the unreal engine (version 4.24.3+) to play the game.
